Class RegistrationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller.RegistrationController

  • @Controller
public class RegistrationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the registration process with the backend

      • registerPage

        @GetMapping(value="/{organization}/register")
public java.lang.String registerPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="organization")
                                                                                    java.lang.String organization)
        Prepares the register page for the user
        Parameters:
        model -
        organization - The organization the user wants to register to
        Returns:
        The page where users can register

      • processRegistration

        @PostMapping(value="/{organization}/register")
public java.lang.String processRegistration(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                                            User user,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="ouId")
                                                                                            java.util.UUID ouId,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="inputPassword")
                                                                                            java.lang.String inputPassword,
                                                                                            @PathVariable(value="organization")
                                                                                            java.lang.String organization,
                                                                                            org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Processes the registration of the user
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes -
        user - the userobject whose fields are filled by the form
        ouId - the organization to which the user belongs
        request - holds the session so the user can be logged in immediately after registration
        organization - The organization the user wants to register to
        inputPassword - The password from the second field. Used to determine if the user entered two identical passwords
        Returns:
        Sends the user to his feedconfiguration page if the registration was successful otherwise he is redirected to the registration page with all his previous data (besides the passwords) being displayed

      • login

        private void login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                   User user)
        Logs the user into the session
        Parameters:
        request - the http-request holding the http session
        user - the user to authenticate
